member.summary: 0=Normal slump(less movement then slump and movement LT small), 1=fast slump, 2=less movement then slump.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReboundMode
member.summary: 0=fall2knees/slump if shot not running, 1=stumble, 2=slump, 3=restart.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColMassBelow
member.summary: Collisions with non-fixed objects with mass below this will not set this behavior off (e.g. ignore guns).
member.remarks: Default value = 20.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ForwardMode
member.summary: 0=slump, 1=fallToKnees if shot is running, otherwise slump.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.TimeToForward
member.summary: Time after a forwards impact before forwardMode is called (leave sometime for a rebound or brace - the min of 0.1 is to ensure fallOverWall can start although it probably needs only 1or2 frames for the probes to return).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReboundForce
member.summary: If forwards impact only: cheat force to try to get the character away from the wall. 3 is a good value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.BraceWall
member.summary: Brace against wall if forwards impact(at the moment only if bodyBalance is running/in charge of arms).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColVolumeBelow
member.summary: Collisions with non-fixed objects with volume below this will not set this behavior off.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverWallDrape
member.summary: Use fallOverWall as the main drape reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverHighWalls
member.summary: Trigger fall over wall if hit up to spine2 else only if hit up to spine1.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.Snap
member.summary: Add a Snap to when you hit a wall to emphasize the hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: The magnitude of the snap reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.6f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapLeftArm
member.summary: Snap the leftArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapRightArm
member.summary: Snap the rightArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapLeftLeg
member.summary: Snap the leftLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapRightLeg
member.summary: Snap the rightLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapSpine
member.summary: Snap the spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapNeck
member.summary: Snap the neck.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapPhasedLegs
member.summary: Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapHipType
member.summary: Type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.UnSnapInterval
member.summary: Interval before applying reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.UnSnapRatio
member.summary: The magnitude of the reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapUseTorques
member.summary: Use torques to make the snap otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactWeaknessZeroDuration
member.summary: Duration for which the character's upper body stays at minimum stiffness (not quite zero).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactWeaknessRampDuration
member.summary: Duration of the ramp to bring the character's upper body stiffness back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactLoosenessAmount
member.summary: How loose the character is on impact. Between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictim
member.summary: Detected an object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictimPos
member.summary: The intersection pos of a detected object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictimNormal
member.summary: The normal of a detected object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyBalanceHelper for sending a BodyBalance to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyBalance to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: NB. WAS m_bodyStiffness ClaviclesStiffness=9.0f.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Elbow
member.summary: How much the elbow swings based on the leg movement.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Shoulder
member.summary: How much the shoulder(lean1) swings based on the leg movement.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: NB. WAS m_damping NeckDamping=1 ClaviclesDamping=1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Enable and provide a look-at target to make the character's head turn to face it while balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookPos
member.summary: Position of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookInstanceIndex
member.summary: Level index of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SpineStiffness
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SomersaultAngle
member.summary: Multiplier of the somersault 'angle' (lean forward/back) for arms out (lean2).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SomersaultAngleThreshold
member.summary: Amount of somersault 'angle' before m_somersaultAngle is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngle
member.summary: Amount of side somersault 'angle' before sideSomersault is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngleThreshold
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsAutoTurn
member.summary: Automatically turn around if moving backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnWithBumpRadius
member.summary: 0.9 is a sensible value. If pusher within this distance then turn to get out of the way of the pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsArms
member.summary: Bend elbows, relax shoulders and inhibit spine twist when moving backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BlendToZeroPose
member.summary: Blend upper body to zero pose as the character comes to rest. If false blend to a stored pose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPush
member.summary: Put arms out based on lean2 of legs, or angular velocity (lean or twist), or lean (front/back or side/side).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPushMultiplier
member.summary: Arms out based on lean2 of the legs to simulate being pushed.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPushTimeout
member.summary: Number of seconds before turning off the armsOutOnPush response only for Arms out based on lean2 of the legs (NOT for the angle or angular velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ReturningToBalanceArmsOut
member.summary: Range 0:1 0 = don't raise arms if returning to upright position, 0.x = 0.x*raise arms based on angvel and 'angle' settings, 1 = raise arms based on angvel and 'angle' settings.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutStraightenElbows
member.summary: Multiplier for straightening the elbows based on the amount of arms out(lean2) 0 = dont straighten elbows. Otherwise straighten elbows proportionately to armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutMinLean2
member.summary: Minimum desiredLean2 applied to shoulder (to stop arms going above shoulder height or not).
member.remarks: Default value = -9.9f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SpineDamping
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.UseBodyTurn
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ElbowAngleOnContact
member.summary: On contact with upperbody the desired elbow angle is set to at least this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BendElbowsTime
member.summary: Time after contact (with Upper body) that the min m_elbowAngleOnContact is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BendElbowsGait
member.summary: Minimum desired angle of elbow during non contact arm swing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HipL2ArmL2
member.summary: Mmmmdrunk = 0.2 multiplier of hip lean2 (star jump) to give shoulder lean2 (flapping).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderL2
member.summary: Mmmmdrunk = 0.7 shoulder lean2 offset.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderL1
member.summary: Mmmmdrunk 1.1 shoulder lean1 offset (+ve frankenstein).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderTwist
member.summary: Mmmmdrunk = 0.0 shoulder twist.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.4f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookAtVelProb
member.summary: Probability [0-1] that headLook will be looking in the direction of velocity when stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnOffProb
member.summary: Weighted probability that turn will be off. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Turn2VelProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning towards velocity. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnAwayProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning away from headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnLeftProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning left. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnRightProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning right. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Turn2TargetProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning towards headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.AngVelMultiplier
member.summary: Somersault, twist, sideSomersault) multiplier of the angular velocity for arms out (lean2) (somersault, twist, sideSomersault).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(4.0f, 1.0f, 4.0f). Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.AngVelThreshold
member.summary: Somersault, twist, sideSomersault) threshold above which angVel is used for arms out (lean2) Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 7.0 for each component.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(1.2f, 3.0f, 1.2f). Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceDistance
member.summary: If -ve then do not brace. distance from object at which to raise hands to brace 0.5 good if newBrace=true - otherwise 0.65.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TargetPredictionTime
member.summary: Time expected to get arms up from idle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ReachAbsorbtionTime
member.summary: Larger values and he absorbs the impact more.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of character. Catch_fall stiffness scales with this too, with its defaults at this values default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MinBraceTime
member.summary: Minimum bracing time so the character doesn't look twitchy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TimeToBackwardsBrace
member.summary: Time before arm brace kicks in when hit from behind.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HandsDelayMin
member.summary: If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at least this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HandsDelayMax
member.summary: If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at most this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceOffset
member.summary: BraceTarget is global headLookPos plus braceOffset m in the up direction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveRadius
member.summary: If -ve don't move away from pusher unless moveWhenBracing is true and braceDistance GT 0.0f. if the pusher is closer than moveRadius then move away from it.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveAmount
member.summary: Amount of leanForce applied away from pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveWhenBracing
member.summary: Only move away from pusher when bracing against pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyFoetalHelper for sending a BodyFoetal to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyFoetal to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: The stiffness of the body determines how fast the character moves into the position, and how well that they hold it.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.DampingFactor
member.summary: Sets damping value for the character joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Asymmetry
member.summary: A value between 0-1 that controls how asymmetric the results are by varying stiffness across the body.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.RandomSeed
member.summary: Random seed used to generate asymmetry values.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.BackTwist
member.summary: Amount of random back twist to add.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyRollUpHelper for sending a BodyRollUp to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyRollUp to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of whole body.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.UseArmToSlowDown
member.summary: The degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.3f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.ArmReachAmount
member.summary: The likeliness of the character reaching for the ground with its arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.LegPush
member.summary: Used to keep rolling down slope, 1 is full (kicks legs out when pointing upwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.NoRollTimeBeforeSuccess
member.summary: Time that roll velocity has to be lower than rollVelForSuccess, before success message is sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelForSuccess
member.summary: Lower threshold for roll velocity at which success message can be sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelLinearContribution
member.summary: Contribution of linear COM velocity to roll Velocity (if 0, roll velocity equal to COM angular velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityScale
member.summary: Scales perceived body velocity. The higher this value gets, the more quickly the velocity measure saturates, resulting in a tighter roll at slower speeds. (NB: Set to 1 to match earlier behavior).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityOffset
member.summary: Offsets perceived body velocity. Increase to create larger "dead zone" around zero velocity where character will be less rolled. (NB: Reset to 0 to match earlier behavior).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Controls whether or not behavior enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyWritheHelper for sending a BodyWrithe to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyWrithe to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmStiffness
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackStiffness
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: The stiffness of the character will determine how 'determined' a writhe this is - high values will make him thrash about wildly.
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackDamping
member.summary: Damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegDamping
member.summary: Damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmPeriod
member.summary: Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackPeriod
member.summary: Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegPeriod
member.summary: Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackAmplitude
member.summary: Scales the amount of writhe. 0 = no writhe.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegAmplitude
member.summary: Scales the amount of writhe. 0 = no writhe.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ElbowAmplitude
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.KneeAmplitude
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollOverFlag
member.summary: Flag to set trying to rollOver.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendArms
member.summary: Blend the writhe arms with the current desired arms (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendBack
member.summary: Blend the writhe spine and neck with the current desired (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendLegs
member.summary: Blend the writhe legs with the current desired legs (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Use writhe stiffnesses if true. If false don't set any stiffnesses.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.OnFire
member.summary: Extra shoulderBlend. Rolling:one way only, maxRollOverTime, rollOverRadius, doesn't reduce arm stiffness to help rolling. No shoulder twist.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ShoulderLean1
member.summary: Blend writhe shoulder desired lean1 with this angle in RAD. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ShoulderLean2
member.summary: Blend writhe shoulder desired lean2 with this angle in RAD. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean1BlendFactor
member.summary: Shoulder desired lean1 with shoulderLean1 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean1 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean2BlendFactor
member.summary: Shoulder desired lean2 with shoulderLean2 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean2 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine.
member.remarks: Default value = 150.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 300.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BraceForImpactHelper for sending a BraceForImpact to a given .
member.param: The to send the BraceForImpact to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BraceDistance
member.summary: Distance from object at which to raise hands to brace 0.5 good if newBrace=true - otherwise 0.65.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.TargetPredictionTime
member.summary: Time epected to get arms up from idle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.ReachAbsorbtionTime
member.summary: Larger values and he absorbs the impact more.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.InstanceIndex
member.summary: LevelIndex of object to brace.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of character. Catch_fall stiffness scales with this too, with its defaults at this values default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabDontLetGo
member.summary: Once a constraint is made, keep reaching with whatever hand is allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabStrength
member.summary: Strength in hands for grabbing (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 40.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabDistance
member.summary: Relative distance at which the grab starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabReachAngle
member.summary: Angle from front at which the grab activates. If the point is outside this angle from front will not try to grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.2f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabHoldTimer
member.summary: Amount of time, in seconds, before grab automatically bails.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MaxGrabCarVelocity
member.summary: Don't try to grab a car moving above this speed mmmmtodo make this the relative velocity of car to character?.
member.remarks: Default value = 95.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Balancer leg stiffness mmmmtodo remove this parameter and use configureBalance?.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.TimeToBackwardsBrace
member.summary: Time before arm brace kicks in when hit from behind.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Look
member.summary: Position to look at, e.g. the driver.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Pos
member.summary: Location of the front part of the object to brace against. This should be the center of where his hands should meet the object.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MinBraceTime
member.summary: Minimum bracing time so the character doesn't look twitchy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.HandsDelayMin
member.summary: If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at least this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.HandsDelayMax
member.summary: If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at most this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAway
member.summary: Move away from the car (if in reaching zone).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAwayAmount
member.summary: ForceLean away amount (-ve is lean towards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAwayLean
member.summary: Lean away amount (-ve is lean towards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveSideways
member.summary: Amount of sideways movement if at the front or back of the car to add to the move away from car.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BbArms
member.summary: Use bodyBalance arms for the default (non bracing) behavior if bodyBalance is active.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.NewBrace
member.summary: Use the new brace prediction code.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BraceOnImpact
member.summary: If true then if a shin or thigh is in contact with the car then brace. NB: newBrace must be true. For those situations where the car has pushed the ped backwards (at the same speed as the car) before the behavior has been started and so doesn't predict an impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Roll2Velocity
member.summary: When rollDownStairs is running use roll2Velocity to control the helper torques (this only attempts to roll to the chaarcter's velocity not some default linear velocity mag.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.RollType
member.summary: 0 = original/roll off/stay on car: Roll with character velocity, 1 = //Gentle: roll off/stay on car = use relative velocity of character to car to roll against, 2 = //roll over car: Roll against character velocity. i.e. roll against any velocity picked up by hitting car, 3 = //Gentle: roll over car: use relative velocity of character to car to roll with.
member.remarks: Default value = 3. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpacts
member.summary: Exaggerate impacts using snap.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpact
member.summary: Exaggeration amount of the initial impact (legs). +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips in the car velocity direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapBonnet
member.summary: Exaggeration amount of the secondary (torso) impact with bonnet. +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips by the impact normal). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = -7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapFloor
member.summary: Exaggeration amount of the impact with the floor after falling off of car +ve fold with floor impact (as if pushed at hips in the impact normal direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampVel
member.summary: Damp out excessive spin and upward velocity when on car.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpin
member.summary: Amount to damp spinning by (cartwheeling and somersaulting).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVel
member.summary: Amount to damp upward velocity by to limit the amount of air above the car the character can get.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpinThresh
member.summary: Angular velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVelThresh
member.summary: Upward velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsHelp
member.summary: Enhance a glancing spin with the side of the car by modulating body friction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsEndMin
member.summary: ID for glancing spin. Min depth to be considered from either end (front/rear) of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.1f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMin
member.summary: ID for glancing spin. Min depth to be considered on the side of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMax
member.summary: ID for glancing spin. Max depth to be considered on the side of a car (+ve is outside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsUpness
member.summary: ID for glancing spin. Character has to be more upright than this value for it to be considered on the side of a car. Fully upright = 1, upsideDown = -1. Max Angle from upright is acos(gsUpness).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsCarVelMin
member.summary: ID for glancing spin. Minimum car velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsScale1Foot
member.summary: Apply gsFricScale1 to the foot if colliding with car. (Otherwise foot friction - with the ground - is determined by gsFricScale2 if it is in gsFricMask2).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale1
member.summary: Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by upping the friction against the car.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask1
member.summary: Glancing spin help. Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any body parts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale2
member.summary: Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by lowering the feet friction. You could also lower the wrist friction here to stop the car pulling along the hands i.e. gsFricMask2 = la|uw.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask2
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any body parts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = la.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper
member.summary: Simple buoyancy model. No character movement just fluid forces/torques added to parts.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.SurfaceNormal

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Buoyancy

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.ChestBuoyancy

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Damping

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Righting

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.RightingStrength

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.RightingTime

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the CatchFallHelper for sending a CatchFall to a given .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.TorsoStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of torso.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.LegsStiffness

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ArmsStiffness

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Toggle to use the head look in this behavior.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ElectrocuteHelper for sending a Electrocute to a given .
member.param: The to send the Electrocute to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunMag
member.summary: The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.InitialMult
member.summary: InitialMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the 1st snap reaction (other multipliers are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMult
member.summary: LargeMult*stunMag = The magnitude of a random large snap reaction (other multipliers are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMinTime
member.summary: Min time to next large random snap (about 14 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMaxTime
member.summary: Max time to next large random snap (about 28 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingMult
member.summary: MovingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.BalancingMult
member.summary: BalancingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.AirborneMult
member.summary: AirborneMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingThresh
member.summary: If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunInterval
member.summary: Direction flips every stunInterval.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.DirectionRandomness
member.summary: The character vibrates in a prescribed way - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LeftArm
member.summary: Vibrate the leftArm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.RightArm
member.summary: Vibrate the rightArm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LeftLeg
member.summary: Vibrate the leftLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.RightLeg
member.summary: Vibrate the rightLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.Spine
member.summary: Vibrate the spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.Neck
member.summary: Vibrate the neck.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.PhasedLegs
member.summary: Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Let electrocute apply a (higher generally) stiffness to the character whilst being vibrated.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.UseTorques
member.summary: Use torques to make vibration otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.HipType
member.summary: Type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the FallOverWallHelper for sending a FallOverWall to a given .
member.param: The to send the FallOverWall to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of the body, roll up stiffness scales with this and defaults at this default value.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.Damping
member.summary: Damping in the effectors.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MagOfForce
member.summary: Magnitude of the falloverWall helper force.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxDistanceFromPelToHitPoint
member.summary: The maximum distance away from the pelvis that hit points will be registered.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxForceDist
member.summary: Maximum distance between hitPoint and body part at which forces are applied to part.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.StepExclusionZone
member.summary: Specifies extent of area in front of the wall in which balancer won't try to take another step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MinLegHeight
member.summary: Minimum height of pelvis above feet at which fallOverWall is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BodyTwist
member.summary: Amount of twist to apply to the spine as the character tries to fling himself over the wall, provides more of a believable roll but increases the amount of lateral space the character needs to successfully flip.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxTwist
member.summary: Max angle the character can twist before twsit helper torques are turned off.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndA
member.summary: One end of the wall to try to fall over.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndB
member.summary: One end of the wall over which we are trying to fall over.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceAngleAbort
member.summary: The angle abort threshold.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceTimeOut
member.summary: The force time out.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveArms
member.summary: Lift the arms up if true. Do nothing with the arms if false (eg when using catchfall arms or brace etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveLegs
member.summary: Move the legs if true. Do nothing with the legs if false (eg when using dynamicBalancer etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BendSpine
member.summary: Bend spine to help falloverwall if true. Do nothing with the spine if false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleDirWithWallNormal
member.summary: Maximum angle in degrees (between the direction of the velocity of the COM and the wall normal) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.LeaningAngleThreshold
member.summary: Maximum angle in degrees (between the vertical vector and a vector from pelvis to lower neck) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: If the angular velocity is higher than maxAngVel, the torques and forces are not applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AdaptForcesToLowWall
member.summary: Will reduce the magnitude of the forces applied to the character to help him to fall over wall.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxWallHeight
member.summary: Maximum height (from the lowest foot) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.DistanceToSendSuccessMessage
member.summary: Minimum distance between the pelvis and the wall to send the success message. If negative doesn't take this parameter into account when sending feedback.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingBackThr
member.summary: Value of the angular velocity about the wallEgde above which the character is considered as rolling backwards i.e. goes in to fow_RollingBack state.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingPotential
member.summary: On impact with the wall if the rollingPotential(calculated from the characters linear velocity w.r.t the wall) is greater than this value the character will try to go over the wall otherwise it won't try (fow_Aborted).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.UseArmIK
member.summary: Try to reach the wallEdge. To configure the IK : use limitAngleBack, limitAngleFront and limitAngleTotallyBack.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MinReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Minimal distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall. Used if the hand target is outside the wall Edge.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleTotallyBack
member.summary: Max angle in degrees (between 1.the vector between two hips and 2. WallEdge) to try to reach the wall just behind his pelvis with his arms when the character is back to the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.StickyHands

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.TurnToTarget

member.summary: Amount of time, in seconds, before grab automatically bails.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PullUpTime

member.summary: Grab pos1, right hand if not using line or surface grab.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos2
member.summary: Grab pos2, left hand if not using line or surface grab.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos3
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos4
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalR
member.summary: Normal for the right grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalL

member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalR2
member.summary: Normal for the 2nd right grab point (if pointsX4grab=true).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalL2
member.summary: Normal for the 3rd left grab point (if pointsX4grab=true).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.HandsCollide
member.summary: Hand collisions on when grabbing (false turns off hand collisions making grab more stable esp. To grab points slightly inside geometry).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.JustBrace
member.summary: Flag to toggle between grabbing and bracing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseLineGrab
member.summary: Use the line grab, Grab along the line (x-x2).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PointsX4grab
member.summary: Use 2 point.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.FromEA
member.summary: Use 2 point.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.SurfaceGrab
member.summary: Toggle surface grab on. Requires pos1,pos2,pos3 and pos4 to be specified.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.InstanceIndex
member.summary: LevelIndex of instance to grab (-1 = world coordinates).
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.InstancePartIndex
member.summary: BoundIndex of part on instance to grab (0 = just use instance coordinates).
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.DontLetGo
member.summary: Once a constraint is made, keep reaching with whatever hand is allowed - no matter what the angle/distance and whether or not the constraint has broken due to constraintForce GT grabStrength. mmmtodo this is a badly named parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of upper body. Scales the arm grab such that the armStiffness is default when this is at default value.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ReachAngle
member.summary: Angle from front at which the grab activates. If the point is outside this angle from front will not try to grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.OneSideReachAngle
member.summary: Angle at which we will only reach with one hand.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.GrabDistance
member.summary: Relative distance at which the grab starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Move2Radius
member.summary: Relative distance (additional to grabDistance - doesn't try to move inside grabDistance)at which the grab tries to use the balancer to move to the grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 14.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 14.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.MaxReachDistance
member.summary: Distance to reach out towards the grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.OrientationConstraintScale
member.summary: Scale torque used to rotate hands to face normals.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.MaxWristAngle
member.summary: When we are grabbing the max angle the wrist ccan be at before we break the grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.2f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseHeadLookToTarget
member.summary: If true, the character will look at targetForHeadLook after a hand grabs until the end of the behavior. (Before grabbing it looks at the grab target).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.LookAtGrab
member.summary: If true, the character will look at the grab.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.TargetForHeadLook
member.summary: Only used if useHeadLookToTarget is true, the target in world space to look at.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the HeadLookHelper for sending a HeadLook to a given .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Damping
member.summary: Damping of the muscles.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of the muscles.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.InstanceIndex

member.summary: The velocity of the point being looked at.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Pos
member.summary: The point being looked at.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.AlwaysLook
member.summary: Flag to force always to look.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.EyesHorizontal
member.summary: Keep the eyes horizontal. Use true for impact with cars. Use false if you want better look at target accuracy when the character is on the floor or leaned over alot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.AlwaysEyesHorizontal
member.summary: Keep the eyes horizontal. Use true for impact with cars. Use false if you want better look at target accuracy when the character is on the floor or leaned over (when not leaned over the eyes are still kept horizontal if eyesHorizontal=true ) alot.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.KeepHeadAwayFromGround
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.TwistSpine
member.summary: Allow head look to twist spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the HighFallHelper for sending a HighFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the HighFall to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of body. Value feeds through to bodyBalance (synced with defaults), to armsWindmill (14 for this value at default ), legs pedal, head look and roll down stairs directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Bodydamping
member.summary: The damping of the joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Catchfalltime
member.summary: The length of time before the impact that the character transitions to the landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.CrashOrLandCutOff
member.summary: 0.52angle is 0.868 dot//A threshold for deciding how far away from upright the character needs to be before bailing out (going into a foetal) instead of trying to land (keeping stretched out). NB: never does bailout if ignorWorldCollisions true.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdStrength
member.summary: Strength of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdDamping
member.summary: Damping multiplier of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical. The actual damping is pdDamping*pdStrength*constant*angVel.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAngSpeed
member.summary: Arm circling speed in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmPhase
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive 3.1 opposite for stuntman. 1.0 old default. 0.0 in phase.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmBendElbows
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive bend the elbows as a function of armAngle. For stunt man true otherwise false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegRadius
member.summary: Radius of legs on pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAngSpeed
member.summary: In pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAsymmetry
member.summary: 0.0 for stuntman. Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronize the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsPhase
member.summary: Phase angle between the arms and legs circling angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsSync
member.summary: Syncs the arms angle to what the leg angle is.
member.remarks: Default value = . All speed/direction parameters of armswindmill are overwritten if = . If and you want synced arms/legs then armAngSpeed=legAngSpeed, legAsymmetry = 0.0 (to stop randomizations of the leg cicle speed).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmsUp
member.summary: Where to put the arms when preparing to land. Approx 1 = above head, 0 = head height, -1 = down. LT -2.0 use catchFall arms, LT -3.0 use prepare for landing pose if Agent is due to land vertically, feet first.
member.remarks: Default value = -3.1f. Min value = -4.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateBodyToFallDirection
member.summary: Toggle to orientate to fall direction. i.e. orientate so that the character faces the horizontal velocity direction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateTwist
member.summary: If false don't worry about the twist angle of the character when orientating the character. If false this allows the twist axis of the character to be free (You can get a nice twisting highFall like the one in dieHard 4 when the car goes into the helicopter).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateMax
member.summary: DEVEL parameter - suggest you don't edit it. Maximum torque the orientation controller can apply. If 0 then no helper torques will be used. 300 will orientate the character softly for all but extreme angles away from aimAngleBase. If abs (current -aimAngleBase) is getting near 3.0 then this can be reduced to give a softer feel.
member.remarks: Default value = 300.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AlanRickman
member.summary: If true then orientate the character to face the point from where it started falling. High fall like the one in "Die Hard" with Alan Rickman.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardRoll
member.summary: Try to execute a forward Roll on landing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll
member.summary: Blend to a zero pose when forward roll is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AimAngleBase
member.summary: Angle from vertical the pdController is driving to (positive = forwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -3.1f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardVelRotation
member.summary: Scale to add/subtract from aimAngle based on forward speed (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FootVelCompScale
member.summary: Scale to change to amount of vel that is added to the foot ik from the velocity (Internal).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardOffsetOfLegIK
member.summary: Forward offset for the feet during prepareForLanding.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegL

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.CatchFallCutOff
member.summary: 0.5angle is 0.878 dot. Cutoff to go to the catchFall ( internal) //mmmtodo do like crashOrLandCutOff.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegStrength
member.summary: Strength of the legs at landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Balance
member.summary: If true have enough strength to balance. If false not enough strength in legs to balance (even though bodyBlance called).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.IgnorWorldCollisions
member.summary: Never go into bailout (foetal).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AdaptiveCircling
member.summary: Stunt man type fall. Arm and legs circling direction controlled by angmom and orientation.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Hula
member.summary: With stunt man type fall. Hula reaction if can't see floor and not rotating fast.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall
member.summary: Character needs to be moving less than this speed to consider fall as a recoverable one.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.MinSpeedForBrace
member.summary: Character needs to be moving at least this fast horizontally to start bracing for impact if there is an object along its trajectory.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LandingNormal
member.summary: Ray-cast normal doted with up direction has to be greater than this number to consider object flat enough to land on it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StaggerLeanRate

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StumbleMaxLeanBack
member.summary: Max the character leans hips back when staggering.
