member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StumbleMaxLeanForward
member.summary: Max the character leans hips forwards when staggering.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.ArmsWindmillWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend armsWindmill with the bodyWrithe arms when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.SpineStumbleWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend spine stumble with the bodyWrithe spine when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.LegsStumbleWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend legs stumble with the bodyWrithe legs when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.ArmsPoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend the bodyWrithe arms with the current desired pose from on fire behavior when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.SpinePoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend the bodyWrithe back with the current desired pose from on fire behavior when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.LegsPoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Blend the bodyWrithe legs with the current desired pose from on fire behavior when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollOverFlag
member.summary: Flag to set bodyWrithe trying to rollOver.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine by bodyWrithe. Torque magnitude is calculated with the following formula: m_rollOverDirection*rollOverPhase*rollTorqueScale.
member.remarks: Default value = 25.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 300.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.PredictTime
member.summary: Character pose depends on character facing direction that is evaluated from its COMTM orientation. Set this value to 0 to use no orientation prediction i.e. current character COMTM orientation will be used to determine character facing direction and finally the pose bodyWrithe is blending to. Set this value to GT 0 to predict character COMTM orientation this amount of time in seconds to the future.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the PedalLegsHelper for sending a PedalLegs to a given .
member.param: The to send the PedalLegs to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalLeftLeg
member.summary: Pedal with this leg or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalRightLeg
member.summary: Pedal with this leg or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.BackPedal
member.summary: Pedal forwards or backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Radius
member.summary: Base radius of pedal action.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngularSpeed
member.summary: Rate of pedaling. If adaptivePedal4Dragging is true then the legsAngularSpeed calculated to match the linear speed of the character can have a maximum value of angularSpeed (this max used to be hard coded to 13.0).
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalOffset
member.summary: Move the center of the pedal for the left leg up by this amount, the right leg down by this amount.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RandomSeed
member.summary: Random seed used to generate speed changes.
member.remarks: Default value = 100. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.SpeedAsymmetry
member.summary: Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronize the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AdaptivePedal4Dragging
member.summary: Will pedal in the direction of travel (if backPedal = false, against travel if backPedal = true) and with an angular velocity relative to speed upto a maximum of 13(rads/sec). Use when being dragged by a car. Overrides angularSpeed.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngSpeedMultiplier4Dragging
member.summary: NewAngularSpeed = Clamp(angSpeedMultiplier4Dragging * linear_speed/pedalRadius, 0.0, angularSpeed).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RadiusVariance
member.summary: 0-1 value used to add variance to the radius value while pedalling, to desynchonize the legs' movement and provide some variety.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegAngleVariance
member.summary: 0-1 value used to vary the angle of the legs from the hips during the pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreSideways
member.summary: Move the center of the pedal for both legs sideways (+ve = right). NB: not applied to hula.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreForwards
member.summary: Move the center of the pedal for both legs forward (or backward -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreUp
member.summary: Move the center of the pedal for both legs up (or down -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Ellipse
member.summary: Turn the circle into an ellipse. Ellipse has horizontal radius a and vertical radius b. If ellipse is +ve then a=radius*ellipse and b=radius. If ellipse is -ve then a=radius and b = radius*ellipse. 0.0 = vertical line of length 2*radius, 0.0:1.0 circle squashed horizontally (vertical radius = radius), 1.0=circle. -0.001 = horizontal line of length 2*radius, -0.0:-1.0 circle squashed vertically (horizontal radius = radius), -1.0 = circle.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.DragReduction
member.summary: How much to account for the target moving through space rather than being static.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Spread
member.summary: Spread legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Hula
member.summary: If true circle the legs in a hula motion.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: NB: Only Applied to single handed weapons (some more work is required to have this tech on two handed weapons). Amount to lead target based on target velocity relative to the chest.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 14.0f. Min value = 2.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmStiffnessDetSupport
member.summary: Stiffness of the arm on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 2.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.GravityOpposition
member.summary: Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.GravOppDetachedSupport
member.summary: Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MassMultDetachedSupport
member.summary: Amount of mass of weapon taken into account by gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon. The lower the value the more the character doesn't know about the weapon mass and therefore is more affected by it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AllowShotLooseness
member.summary: Allow shot to set a lower arm muscleStiffness than pointGun normally would.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ClavicleBlend
member.summary: How much of blend should come from incoming transforms 0(all IK) .. 1(all ITMs) For pointing arms only. (Support arm uses the IK solution as is for clavicles).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ElbowAttitude
member.summary: Controls arm twist. (except in pistolIK).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.SupportConstraint
member.summary: Type of constraint between the support hand and gun. 0=no constraint, 1=hard distance constraint, 2=Force based constraint, 3=hard spherical constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 1: Support hand constraint distance will be slowly reduced until it hits this value. This is for stability and also allows the pointing arm to lead a little. Don't set lower than NM_MIN_STABLE_DISTANCECONSTRAINT_DISTANCE 0.001f.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MakeConstraintDistance
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 1: Minimum distance within which support hand constraint will be made.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ReduceConstraintLengthVel
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 1: Velocity at which to reduce the support hand constraint length.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BreakingStrength
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 1: strength of the supporting hands constraint (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenSupportTime
member.summary: Once constraint is broken then do not try to reconnect/support for this amount of time.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenToSideProb
member.summary: Probability that the when a constraint is broken that during brokenSupportTime a side pose will be selected.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectAfter
member.summary: If gunArm has been controlled by other behaviors for this time when it could have been pointing but couldn't due to pointing only allowed if connected, change gunArm pose to something that could connect for connectFor seconds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectFor
member.summary: Time to try to reconnect for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.OneHandedPointing
member.summary: 0 = don't allow, 1= allow for kPistol(two handed pistol) only, 2 = allow for kRifle only, 3 = allow for kPistol and kRifle. Allow one handed pointing - no constraint if cant be supported . If not allowed then gunHand does not try to point at target if it cannot be supported - the constraint will be controlled by always support.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AlwaysSupport
member.summary: Support a non pointing gunHand i.e. if in zero pose (constrain as well if constraint possible).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedGunArm
member.summary: Apply neutral pose when a gun arm isn't in use. NB: at the moment Rifle hand is always controlled by pointGun.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedSupportArm
member.summary: Apply neutral pose when a support arm isn't in use.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedOtherArm
member.summary: Apply neutral pose to the non-gun arm (otherwise it is always under the control of other behaviors or not set). If the non-gun hand is a supporting hand it is not controlled by this parameter but by poseUnusedSupportArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAcross
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAway
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingLimits
member.summary: 0= don't apply limits. 1=apply the limits below only when the character is falling. 2 = always apply these limits (instead of applying maxAngleAcross and maxAngleAway which only limits the horizontal angle but implicity limits the updown (the limit shape is a vertical hinge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AcrossLimit
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle left of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AwayLimit
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle right of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UpLimit
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) upwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DownLimit
member.summary: Max aiming angle(deg) downwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 45.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleFall
member.summary: Pose the rifle hand to reduce complications with collisions. 0 = false, 1 = always when falling, 2 = when falling except if falling backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingSupport
member.summary: Allow supporting of a rifle(or two handed pistol) when falling. 0 = false, 1 = support if allowed, 2 = support until constraint not active (don't allow support to restart), 3 = support until constraint not effective (support hand to support distance must be less than 0.15 - don't allow support to restart).
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingTypeSupport
member.summary: What is considered a fall by fallingSupport). Apply fallingSupport 0=never(will support if allowed), 1 = falling, 2 = falling except if falling backwards, 3 = falling and collided, 4 = falling and collided except if falling backwards, 5 = falling except if falling backwards until collided.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 5.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PistolNeutralType
member.summary: 0 = byFace, 1=acrossFront, 2=bySide. NB: bySide is not connectible so be careful if combined with kPistol and oneHandedPointing = 0 or 2.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.NeutralPoint4Pistols
member.summary: NOT IMPLEMENTED YET KEEP=false - use pointing for neutral targets in pistol modes.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.NeutralPoint4Rifle
member.summary: Use pointing for neutral targets in rifle mode.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.CheckNeutralPoint
member.summary: Check the neutral pointing is pointable, if it isn't then choose a neutral pose instead.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.Point2Side
member.summary: Side, up, back) side is left for left arm, right for right arm mmmmtodo.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(5.0f, -5.0f, -2.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.Add2WeaponDistSide
member.summary: Add to weaponDistance for point2Side neutral pointing (to straighten the arm).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.Point2Connect
member.summary: Side, up, back) side is left for left arm, right for rght arm mmmmtodo.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(-1.0f, -0.9f, -0.2f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.Add2WeaponDistConnect
member.summary: Add to weaponDistance for point2Connect neutral pointing (to straighten the arm).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UsePistolIK
member.summary: Enable new ik for pistol pointing.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseSpineTwist
member.summary: Use spine twist to orient chest?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseTurnToTarget
member.summary: Turn balancer to help gun point at target.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Use head look to drive head?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ErrorThreshold
member.summary: Angular difference between pointing direction and target direction above which feedback will be generated.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxTime
member.summary: Duration of arms relax following firing weapon. NB:This is clamped (0,5) in pointGun.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxAmount
member.summary: Relax multiplier following firing weapon. Recovers over relaxTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxDistance
member.summary: Range of motion for ik-based recoil.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseIncomingTransforms
member.summary: Use the incoming transforms to inform the pointGun of the primaryWeaponDistance, poleVector for the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MeasureParentOffset
member.summary: If useIncomingTransforms = true and measureParentOffset=true then measure the Pointing-from offset from parent effector, using itms - this should point the barrel of the gun to the target. This is added to the rightHandParentOffset. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentOffset
member.summary: Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentEffector
member.summary: 1 = Use leftShoulder. Effector from which the left hand pointing originates. Ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentOffset
member.summary: Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down. This is added to the measured one if useIncomingTransforms=true and measureParentOffset=true. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0. Pistol(0,0,0) Rifle(0.0032, 0.0, -0.0).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentEffector
member.summary: 1 = Use rightShoulder.. Effector from which the right hand pointing originates. Ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PrimaryHandWeaponDistance
member.summary: Distance from the shoulder to hold the weapon. If -1 and useIncomingTransforms then weaponDistance is read from ITMs. WeaponDistance=primaryHandWeaponDistance clamped [0.2f:m_maxArmReach=0.65] if useIncomingTransforms = false. pistol 0.60383, rifle 0.336.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstrainRifle
member.summary: Use hard constraint to keep rifle stock against shoulder?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Rifle constraint distance. Deliberately kept large to create a flat constraint surface where rifle meets the shoulder.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableArmCollisions
member.summary: Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and the torso/legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableRifleCollisions
member.summary: Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and spine3/spine2 if in rifle mode.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper
member.summary: Seldom set parameters for pointGun - just to keep number of parameters in any message less than or equal to 64.

member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.ConstraintThresh
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 2: Like makeConstraintDistance. Force starts acting when the hands are LT 3.0*thresh apart but is maximum strength LT thresh. For comparison: 0.1 is used for reachForWound in shot, 0.25 is used in grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.WeaponMask
member.summary: Currently unused - no intoWorldTest. RAGE bit mask to exclude weapons from ray probe - currently defaults to MP3 weapon flag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1024. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpActive
member.summary: Is timeWarpActive enabled?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpStrengthScale
member.summary: Scale for arm and helper strength when timewarp is enabled. 1 = normal compensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriStiff
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriDamp
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosStiff
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosDamp
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the RollDownStairsHelper for sending a RollDownStairs to a given .
member.param: The to send the RollDownStairs to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Effector Stiffness. Value feeds through to rollUp directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Damping
member.summary: Effector Damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Forcemag
member.summary: Helper force strength. Do not go above 1 for a rollDownStairs/roll along ground reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_useArmToSlowDown
member.summary: The degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.9f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseZeroPose
member.summary: Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.SpinWhenInAir
member.summary: Applied cheat forces to spin the character when in the air, the forces are 40% of the forces applied when touching the ground. Be careful little bunny rabbits, the character could spin unnaturally in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_armReachAmount
member.summary: How much the character reaches with his arms to brace against the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_legPush
member.summary: Amount that the legs push outwards when tumbling.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround
member.summary: Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ArmReachLength
member.summary: The length that the arm reaches and so how much it straightens.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.CustomRollDir
member.summary: Pass in a custom direction in to have the character try and roll in that direction.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f). Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseCustomRollDir
member.summary: Pass in true to use the customRollDir parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTarget
member.summary: The target linear velocity used to start the rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTime
member.summary: Time, in seconds, to decay stiffness down to the stiffnessDecayTarget value (or -1 to disable).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Tries to reduce the spin around the z axis. Scale 0 - 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime
member.summary: Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.OnlyApplyHelperForces
member.summary: Don't use rollup if true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseVelocityOfObjectBelow
member.summary: Scale applied cheat forces/torques to (zero) if object underneath character has velocity greater than 1.f.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseRelativeVelocity
member.summary: UseVelocityOfObjectBelow uses a relative velocity of the character to the object underneath.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyFoetalToLegs
member.summary: If true, use rollup for upper body and a kind of foetal behavior for legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MovementLegsInFoetalPosition
member.summary: Only used if applyFoetalToLegs = true : define the variation of angles for the joints of the legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVelAroundFrontwardAxis
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : maximal angular velocity around frontward axis of the pelvis to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MinAngVel
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : minimal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyNewRollingCheatingTorques
member.summary: If true will use the new way to apply cheating torques (like in fallOverWall), otherwise will use the old way.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : maximal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToRoll
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : magnitude of the torque to roll down the stairs.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyHelPerTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Apply torque to align the body orthogonally to the direction of the roll.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.DelayToAlignBody
member.summary: Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : delay to start to apply torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : magnitude of the torque to align orthogonally the body.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AirborneReduction
member.summary: Ordinarily keep at 0.85. Make this lower if you want spinning in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Pass-through to Roll Up. Controls whether or not behavior enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.LimitSpinReduction
member.summary: Scale zAxisSpinReduction back when rotating end-over-end (somersault) to give the body a chance to align with the axis of rotation.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.SpineBlendExagCPain
member.summary: True: spine is blended with zero pose, false: spine is blended with zero pose if not setting exag or cpain.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.SpineBlendZero
member.summary: Spine is always blended with zero pose this much and up to 1 as the character become stationary. If negative no blend is ever applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = -0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.BulletProofVest
member.summary: Looseness applied to spine is different if bulletProofVest is true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AlwaysResetLooseness
member.summary: Looseness always reset on shotNewBullet even if previous looseness ramp still running. Except for the neck which has it's own ramp.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AlwaysResetNeckLooseness
member.summary: Neck looseness always reset on shotNewBullet even if previous looseness ramp still running.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AngVelScale
member.summary: How much to scale the angular velocity coming in from animation of a part if it is in angVelScaleMask (otherwise scale by 1.0).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AngVelScaleMask
member.summary: Parts to scale the initial angular velocity by angVelScale (otherwize scale by 1.0).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FlingWidth
member.summary: Width of the fling behavior.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FlingTime
member.summary: Duration of the fling behavior.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.TimeBeforeReachForWound
member.summary: Time, in seconds, before the character begins to grab for the wound on the first hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagDuration
member.summary: Exaggerate bullet duration (at exagMag/exagTwistMag).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagMag
member.summary: Exaggerate bullet spine Lean magnitude.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagTwistMag
member.summary: Exaggerate bullet spine Twist magnitude.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagSmooth2Zero
member.summary: Exaggerate bullet duration ramping to zero after exagDuration.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagZeroTime
member.summary: Exaggerate bullet time spent at 0 spine lean/twist after exagDuration + exagSmooth2Zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CpainSmooth2Time
member.summary: Conscious pain duration ramping from zero to cpainMag/cpainTwistMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CpainDuration
member.summary: Conscious pain duration at cpainMag/cpainTwistMag after cpainSmooth2Time.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CpainMag
member.summary: Conscious pain spine Lean(back/Forward) magnitude (Replaces spinePainMultiplier).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CpainTwistMag
member.summary: Conscious pain spine Twist/Lean2Side magnitude Replaces spinePainTwistMultiplier).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CpainSmooth2Zero
member.summary: Conscious pain ramping to zero after cpainSmooth2Time + cpainDuration (Replaces spinePainTime).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Crouching
member.summary: Is the guy crouching or not.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ChickenArms
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ReachForWound
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Fling
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: Injured arm code runs if arm hit (turns and steps and bends injured arm).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredLeg
member.summary: When false injured leg is not bent and character does not bend to reach it.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredLowerLegReach
member.summary: When false don't try to reach for injured Lower Legs (shins/feet).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredThighReach
member.summary: When false don't try to reach for injured Thighs.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.StableHandsAndNeck
member.summary: Additional stability for hands and neck (less loose).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Melee
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FallingReaction
member.summary: 0=Rollup, 1=Catchfall, 2=rollDownStairs, 3=smartFall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.UseExtendedCatchFall
member.summary: Keep the character active instead of relaxing at the end of the catch fall.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialWeaknessZeroDuration
member.summary: Duration for which the character's upper body stays at minimum stiffness (not quite zero).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialWeaknessRampDuration
member.summary: Duration of the ramp to bring the character's upper body stiffness back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialNeckDuration
member.summary: Duration for which the neck stays at intial stiffness/damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialNeckRampDuration
member.summary: Duration of the ramp to bring the neck stiffness/damping back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.UseCStrModulation
member.summary: If enabled upper and lower body strength scales with character strength, using the range given by parameters below.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrUpperMin
member.summary: Proportions to what the strength would be normally.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrUpperMax
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrLowerMin
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrLowerMax
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.DeathTime
member.summary: Time to death (HACK for underwater). If -ve don't ever die.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper
member.summary: Send new wound information to the shot. Can cause shot to restart it's performance in part or in whole.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotNewBulletHelper for sending a ShotNewBullet to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotNewBullet to.
member.remarks: Send new wound information to the shot. Can cause shot to restart it's performance in part or in whole.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.BodyPart
member.summary: Part ID on the body where the bullet hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: If true then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in local coordinates of bodyPart. If false then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in World coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.Normal
member.summary: Normal coming out of impact point on character. Can be local or global depending on localHitPointInfo.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Position of impact on character. Can be local or global depending on localHitPointInfo.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.BulletVel
member.summary: Bullet velocity in world coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -2000.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotSnapHelper for sending a ShotSnap to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotSnap to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.Snap
member.summary: Add a Snap to shot.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingMult
member.summary: MovingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapBalancingMult
member.summary: BalancingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapAirborneMult
member.summary: AirborneMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingThresh
member.summary: If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapLeftArm
member.summary: Snap the leftArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapRightArm
member.summary: Snap the rightArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapLeftLeg
member.summary: Snap the leftLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapRightLeg
member.summary: Snap the rightLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapSpine
member.summary: Snap the spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapNeck
member.summary: Snap the neck.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapPhasedLegs
member.summary: Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapHipType
member.summary: Type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapUseBulletDir
member.summary: Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapHitPart
member.summary: Snap only around the wounded part//mmmmtodo check whether bodyPart doesn't have to be remembered for unSnap.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.UnSnapInterval
member.summary: Interval before applying reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.UnSnapRatio
member.summary: The magnitude of the reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapUseTorques
member.summary: Use torques to make the snap otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper
member.summary: Configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotShockSpinHelper for sending a ShotShockSpin to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotShockSpin to.
member.remarks: Configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AddShockSpin
member.summary: If enabled, add a short 'shock' of torque to the character's spine to exaggerate bullet impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.RandomizeShockSpinDirection
member.summary: For use with close-range shotgun blasts, or similar.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AlwaysAddShockSpin
member.summary: If true, apply the shock spin no matter which body component was hit. Otherwise only apply if the spine or clavicles get hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMin
member.summary: Minimum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMax
member.summary: Maximum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinLiftForceMult
member.summary: If greater than 0, apply a force to lift the character up while the torque is applied, trying to produce a dramatic spun/twist shotgun-to-the-chest effect. This is a scale of the torque applied, so 8.0 or so would give a reasonable amount of lift.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinDecayMult
member.summary: Multiplier used when decaying torque spin over time.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScalePerComponent
member.summary: Torque applied is scaled by this amount across the spine components - spine2 recieving the full amount, then 3 and 1 and finally 0. Each time, this value is used to scale it down. 0.5 means half the torque each time.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMaxTwistVel
member.summary: Shock spin ends when twist velocity is greater than this value (try 6.0). If set to -1 does not stop.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm
member.summary: Shock spin scales by lever arm of bullet i.e. bullet impact point to center line.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinAirMult
member.summary: ShockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when both the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpin1FootMult
member.summary: ShockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when the one of the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinFootGripMult
member.summary: ShockSpin scales the torques applied to the feet by footSlipCompensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.BracedSideSpinMult
member.summary: If shot on a side with a forward foot and both feet are on the ground and balanced, increase the shockspin to compensate for the balancer naturally resisting spin to that side.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper
member.summary: Configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotFallToKneesHelper for sending a ShotFallToKnees to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotFallToKnees to.
member.remarks: Configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FallToKnees
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkAlwaysChangeFall
member.summary: Always change fall behavior. If false only change when falling forward.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceTime
member.summary: How long the balancer runs for before fallToKnees starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForce
member.summary: Hip helper force magnitude - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes.
member.remarks: Default value = 200.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForceOnSpine
member.summary: Helper force applied to spine3 as well.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLeanHelp
member.summary: Help balancer lean amount - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes. Half of this is also applied as hipLean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkSpineBend
member.summary: Bend applied to spine when falling from knees. (+ve forward - try -0.1) (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -0.2f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkStiffSpine
member.summary: Stiffen spine when falling from knees (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLooseness
member.summary: Looseness (muscleStiffness = 1.01f - m_parameters.ftkImpactLooseness) applied to upperBody on knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLoosenessTime
member.summary: Time that looseness is applied after knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBendRate
member.summary: Rate at which the legs are bent to go from standing to on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipBlend
member.summary: Blend from current hip to balancing on knees hip angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLungeProb
member.summary: Probability that a lunge reaction will be allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkKneeSpin
member.summary: When on knees allow some spinning of the character. If false then the balancers' footSlipCompensation remains on and tends to keep the character facing the same way as when it was balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFricMult
member.summary: Multiplier on the reduction of friction for the feet based on angle away from horizontal - helps the character fall to knees quicker.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipAngleFall
member.summary: Apply this hip angle when the character starts to fall backwards when on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchForwards
member.summary: Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling forwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchBackwards
member.summary: Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling backwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFallBelowStab
member.summary: Balancer instability below which the character starts to bend legs even if it isn't going to fall on to it's knees (i.e. if going backwards). 0.3 almost ensures a fall to knees but means the character will keep stepping backward until it slows down enough.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: When the character gives up and goes into a fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkOnKneesArmType
member.summary: Type of arm response when on knees falling forward 0=useFallArms (from RollDownstairs or catchFall), 1= armsIn, 2=armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleaseReachForWound
member.summary: Release the reachForWound this amount of time after the knees have hit. If LT 0.0 then keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReachForWound
member.summary: True = Keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state. false = respect the shotConfigureArms params: reachFalling, reachFallingWithOneHand, reachOnFloor.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleasePointGun
member.summary: Override the pointGun when knees hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFailMustCollide
member.summary: The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHeadLookHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Use head look. Default: looks at provided target or if this is zero - looks forward or in velocity direction. If reachForWound is enabled, switches between looking at the wound and at the default target.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHeadLookHelper.HeadLook
member.summary: Position to look at with headlook flag.

member.summary: Min time to look headLook or if zero - forward or in velocity direction.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHeadLookHelper.HeadLookAtHeadPosMinTimer
